Params: {3: 'Massive buildings shatter and dissipate like mirages all around and turn into white mist, as if the opera is approaching its finale...'}
{3: "You arrive with Iris at the theater's edge and cross the boundary between reality and illusion—"}
{1: '1', 3: 'You see a visibly excited crowd exiting the City Hall, with Jonathan at their center. Dandelion is anxiously gesturing to him on the side.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'The two turn in your direction with grave expressions. They freeze for a moment when they see you and Iris, then break into smiles and wave their arms.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{2: 'Looks like things went smoothly over there, too.', 3: '32'}
{3: 'Iris stays silent, exhales deeply, then breaks into a soft laugh.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jonathan', 3: "Hey... hey, I know everyone's excited, but this is just the first step, folks! The first step!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'We still have a lot to prepare. Try to calm down, please. I need to check in with my team first.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Jonathan quiets the crowd and walks over with Dandelion.'}
{2: 'Impressive! Are you done with the signing?', 3: '52'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'Hah... It\'s not that simple. We\'re still a long way off from actually signing "The New Earth Codex." Right now, Bane has only expressed interest in the idea.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: "I'm afraid I'll be staying here for the next few months.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'Hah... Not quite. We\'re still a long way off from actually signing "The New Earth Codex". Right now, Bane has only expressed interest in the idea.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'We still need multiple rounds of negotiations, reviews, and signatures... Just the preliminary consultations for the treaty will take a full week.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: "But it's already a very promising start.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jonathan looks at Iris as he speaks. His expression suddenly changes, like he remembered something.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Iris is amused by Jonathan's action. She presses her lips together, exchanges a glance with you, and gives a serious answer."}

{2: 'Iris', 3: "Yes, it's over. Bane has chosen a side, and the general direction is set. It's no longer something Lueya can change with a few attacks. From now on, you don't have to worry about your safety.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dandelion', 3: 'Um... really? I thought, in the beginning, you told me...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dandelion', 3: 'That it\'s only "over" after the formal signing of the codex? Don\'t we have one more week...?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Iris pauses for a split second without being noticed and dismisses Dandelion's claim with nonchalance."}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "Things don't always go as planned, and besides, isn't the treaty signing process starting tonight?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'Ah yes, thanks to our preparations, Bane is quite satisfied with our... with the attitude shown by the United Government.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Jonathan', 3: "As a gesture of goodwill for our concessions on certain terms, they're hosting an evening reception at the Yuqin Hotel for our delegation, symbolizing the official start of the treaty signing process.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'Once this news is made public, it means that Bane is announcing their position to the entire international community.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'Come with me, please. Without any one of you... I never could have accomplished any of this.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You want to decline. The mission is done, and you need to go back to the correct timeline as soon as possible.'}
{1: '1', 3: "But you change your mind the moment your eyes meet Iris's.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Iris', 3: "Before we part, there's still a bit of time.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Your last shred of hesitation vanishes when you meet Iris's gaze.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Iris', 3: "Before we part, there's still a bit of time.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Jonathan's eyes dart between you and Iris. Something clicks, and he grabs Dandelion and leaves with a knowing smile."}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'See you two tonight! Dandelion and I will wait for you at the hotel.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: "Iris, give F.O.S. a proper makeover. It's on me!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You feign annoyance with a small huff as Iris extends her hand, but ultimately hold it.'}
{3: 'The festive marketplace is lined with promotional signs for sales, discounts, and free gifts.'}
{3: 'You stroll into several clothing stores, patiently standing like a mannequin while Iris takes her time shopping.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You give her a helpless look before Iris finally notices your expression. She holds down a laugh as she calls over a clerk to pay.'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "I'll take all these, plus the one F.O.S. is wearing now. Everything together.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You take your own clothes from Iris and enter the fitting room.'}
{1: '1', 3: "When you come out, you notice she's carrying several shopping bags."}
{3: 'You reach out to take the bags from her, not understanding what she means.'}
{2: "But didn't you say these weren't suitable?", 3: '149'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "I just wanted to fulfill a little wish of mine. I know you wouldn't be comfortable wearing these. We'll just take them home.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she speaks, Iris steps back a little to look you up and down.'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: 'This outfit definitely suits you better. You look more lively in this.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: '<size=30>And it gives me peace of mind.</size>', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staff', 3: 'Excuse me, thank you for shopping here. Here are your card and receipt.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staff', 3: "It's a small gift for spending a certain amount... The Kowloong New Year is coming up.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The clerk smiles and hands another elegant little bag to Iris.'}
{2: "I hope Jonathan doesn't have a heart attack over this.", 3: '165'}
{3: 'Iris accepts the item with a smile and gives you a meaningful wink.'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "Don't worry, I'm not planning to ask him for reimbursement... because...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "I definitely wouldn't want to buy you clothes in his name.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As you exit the store, she immediately opens the gift from the shop and holds it up to her face with delight.'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "Some traditions in Bane are strangely similar to Kowloong's. Before...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Iris suddenly mumbles her words, as if she's said something sensitive."}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "I learned about them while studying cultural geography, but I've never actually tried them before.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'With a flick of her fingers, brilliant colors burst from the tip of the sparkler. Iris holds up the sparkling light, her pupils growing ever brighter in the colorful glow.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Something stirs as blurry figures flicker through your memories. It feels like something is about to surface...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Your empty hand reaches out, but finds nothing.'}
{3: "Iris doesn't notice your actions as she twirls the sparkler, drawing line after line in the air."}
{3: 'As one sparkler burns out, she quickly lights another and repeats the same shape as before.'}
{3: "She wants to connect these two names together in her heart, even if only for the brief flicker of a sparkler's light."}
{3: 'It rained earlier, leaving shallow puddles across the ground that reflect the setting sun, making the scene all the more brilliant.'}
{3: "Iris crouches down, silently watching the sparkler's flickering reflection in the puddle."}
{3: 'The sun is about to sink below the horizon, and this dream, stolen from the weave of time, is about to end.'}
{3: "Iris doesn't answer, nor does she look up. She continues to gaze at her own reflection in the puddle."}
{2: 'Is this information also under confidentiality protocols?', 3: '231'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: '...Do you want to come find me?'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "We are... too far apart. It's like going from the very top line of a musical staff to the very bottom."}
{2: 'Iris', 3: 'The distance from one to five, in terms of time, is already very long.'}
{3: 'Iris smiles in the reflection, but ripples suddenly disturb the puddle, hiding her expression.'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "I'll write to you too and maybe someday..."}
{2: 'Iris', 3: 'Our letters will bridge space and time, allowing us to meet again.'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "I just hope you won't find me annoying. I might write about lots and lots of trivial things..."}
{3: 'You sit with Iris in silence, watching the flicker burn.'}
